Name: Cold Winter Morning
About the game: Cold Winter Morning [/] The game talks about the Shin boy. In it, we experience the saddest stories from Shin's life, in which there is a lot of pain and injustice. However, despite all the hardships of life, Shin will reach the ending and achieve the justice of which he dreamed. The game tells about the boy Shin, who will achieve justice! Will I achieve justice if I become strong? Will I achieve justice if I am stable? The game takes place in an hour. Genre: Visual novel, psyche, love, suffering.
